welcome.about_us_description: Learn more about our company and mission.
welcome.blog_description: Read our latest articles and updates.
welcome.contact_description: Get in touch with our team.
contact.heading: Contact us
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.subject: Subject
blog.title: Blog
auth.login_description: Enter your email and password below to log in
auth.register_description: Enter your details below to create your account
auth.forgot_description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.reset_description: Please enter your new password below
auth.confirm_description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
auth.verify_description: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
auth.two_factor_recovery_description: Please confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.
auth.two_factor_code_description: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
auth.verification_link_sent_registration: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
settings.profile_info_description: Update your name and email address
settings.password_update_description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
settings.send_verification: Click here to re-send the verification email.
settings.verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
settings.two_factor_enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
settings.delete_account_description: Delete your account and all of its resources
settings.delete_account_warning_descript: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
settings.delete_account_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.delete_account_confirm_descript: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
settings.two_factor_disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
